adrFormatAddress: 345 E 37th St #308, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Jacobs and his Practice Manager are excellent. Initially, I had done my research and was anxious about potential surgery. Dr. Jacobs answered all my questions. My surgery was safe, successful. The care received from Dr. Jacobs was phenomenal. I found both Dr. Jacobs and Kathy expert providers who are effective, efficient and dedicated. I felt very much held in their care. Everything from the actual procedures, billing, and follow up was attentive and thorough. After about a month post-op, my airflow improved greatly.

originalText.text: Amazing experience Thank you to Dr Joseph for improving my life!! I felt as if I was in a black hole and his hands were the light!! Cathy was /is very special to me… She guided me, answered all my questions and took my anxiety away!! Thank you to the Medical Assistant as well. Best office

Cathy was /is very special to me… She guided me, answered all my questions and took my anxiety away!! Thank you to the Medical Assistant as well. Best office

originalText.text:
I have high respect for Dr. Jacobs both professionally and as a human being. I found him to be a brilliant Doctor and very measured in his approach. The first 2 doctors I saw recommended very invasive surgery for my sinus obstruction.

As a human being he was very kind and more than happy to answer my questions. I wish more surgeons were like that

Him and Kathy make an excellent team.

EDIT: First day post surgery, I feel good with no pain! Dr. Jacobs was great in the pre-op area as well as the nurses and anesthesiologist. He also came by post-op to tell me it went well. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend him as an excellent doctor to anyone else.

EDIT 2: Two weeks post surgery, feel great! Breathing is so much better! I cannot thank and recommend Dr. Jacobs & Kathy enough. Wonderful and intelligent people.

originalText.text: Dr. Jacobs and Kathy are the best of the best! If you are having sinus issues, look no further than contacting Dr. Jacobs Office. Kathy will take care of you, and Dr. Jacobs is the best in the business when it comes to anything sinus related! Highly recommend him!!!!

text.text: Dr. Jacobs and Kathy are the best of the best! If you are having sinus issues, look no further than contacting Dr. Jacobs Office. Kathy will take care of you, and Dr. Jacobs is the best in the business when it comes to anything sinus related! Highly recommend him!!!!

originalText.text: Have had sinus issues for months and had seen 4 specialists prior to Dr Jacobs. I am very pleased with the results to date with the procedure he performed 2 weeks ago. The office is extremely well run and am very impressed with the individual care I have received versus the big corporately owned practices. I highly recommend Dr Jacobs and his staff.
